relevancy_rationale: Phase 2 trials ongoing (SAR443820/DNL788). Strong genetic evidence linking RIPK1-mediated necroptosis to motor neuron death. OPTN and TBK1 mutations in familial ALS dysregulate RIPK1.
Phase 2 trials with SAR443820. RIPK1 activation observed in MS lesions. Necroptosis contributes to oligodendrocyte death and demyelination.
Clinical development ongoing. RIPK1 activation found in AD brain tissue. Microglial RIPK1 drives neuroinflammation and synapse loss.
Phase 2 trials (SAR443122/DNL758). Intestinal epithelial necroptosis drives barrier dysfunction. TNF-mediated cell death central to pathology.
Phase 2 completed (GSK2982772). RIPK1 drives synovial inflammation. TNF pathway central to RA pathogenesis.
Phase 2 trials (GSK2982772). Keratinocyte necroptosis observed in psoriatic lesions. TNF inhibitors already effective in psoriasis.
Phase 1 for IBD completed. Paneth cell necroptosis implicated. Similar TNF-driven pathology to ulcerative colitis.
Preclinical evidence strong. Dopaminergic neuron necroptosis observed. LRRK2 mutations may interact with RIPK1 signalling.
Preclinical models show benefit. RIPK1-mediated organ damage in systemic inflammation. Compound 21 (ZB-R-55) shows promise in animal models.
Preclinical evidence. Neuronal necroptosis in ischaemia-reperfusion injury. Nec-1s protective in animal stroke models.
Emerging evidence. Phase 2 trial in cutaneous lupus (SAR443122). Interferon-driven inflammation may involve RIPK1.
Preclinical evidence. Hepatocyte necroptosis drives liver inflammation and fibrosis. TNF pathway implicated in NASH progression.
Preclinical only. Secondary neuronal death involves necroptosis. Nec-1 protective in TBI animal models.
Limited evidence. Cardiomyocyte necroptosis in ischaemia-reperfusion. No clinical development planned.
Phase 1/2 trials discontinued (GSK3145095). Conflicting preclinical results. Immunomodulatory effects uncertain.
